info.name: ADC
info.description:
I really like the theme ADC are using but sadly it has some flaws, like how the whole page take like 90% of the width or how large images makes it painful to visit some forum threads. So i took care of that by my self and decided to share it with you guys.

Make sure you to check this page time to time to make sure you have the latest update of this theme!
info.additionalInfo:
What have been done?
# The themes width is now 1000px instead of 90% and have 10px rounded corners.
# [Eye candy] Added box shadow around the main content box.
# All images larger than 500px in both torrent pages and forum threads will be resized.
# [Eye candy] All avatars should now have 3px rounded corners. Does not show on transparent avatars.

Whats next?
I don't know, if i found something or if you have some suggestions on how to make the modified theme even more awesome you are more than welcome to share your ideas and sugestions.
